file_content.text: Thank you for visiting the psychiatric unit.
Good day. Welcome to the psychiatric unit.
Jedi, for once, could we please go somewhere pleasant?
Somehow, I always knew this day would come.
A senior Republic officer left orders to restrain a dangerous prisoner, suffering from the delusion she is a Jedi.
A senior Republic officer ordered me to restrain a dangerous prisoner, suffering from the delusion he is a Jedi.
You match this prisoner's description. I am here to facilitate your needs during your stay.
Whatever you've been told, I'm a member of the Jedi Order.
But I am a Jedi.
Accepting your condition is the first step to recovery.
Let me guess, was the order given by Commander Geland?
Geland's behind this.
Yes. Commander Geland is the officer of record.
Then kindly "facilitate" letting me go.
Get me out of here!
This request is beyond your current privilege level.
Please relax while I await Commander Geland's input on breaking your Jedi delusions.
I could demonstrate my strength in the Force. Would that convince you?
My powers prove I'm a Jedi.
Safety regulations forbid encouraging patients to act out their fantasies.
Don't be alarmed. This is only a demonstration.
[Lift the droid.]
This technique requires awareness and balance only possible through the Force.
[Show it a Force technique.]
Perhaps this will persuade you.
[Damage the droid.]
The commander won't send you anything; he's a traitor.
He's gone rogue.
Your voice stress indicates truth. But all Commander Geland's credentials are sound.
I've discovered the Republic has been infiltrated....
He's a Child of the Emperor.
Commander Geland's trying to stop me from saving the Republic....
My mission's in danger.
He began with making me a category ten prisoner...
Geland's trying to kill me!
Resolving.... The harm you could cause, if you are lying, is dwarfed by the risk from Commander Geland if you are not.
Empirical evidence suggests a clerical error. I apologize, Master Jedi.
If I believe I am a Jedi, and act as one, isn't my "delusion" indistinguishable from actually being a Jedi?
I can break you, with logic.
Critical error. Processing space exceeded. Resetting all systems....
Good day. Welcome to the psychiatric unit, Master Jedi. Have a pleasant visit.
System analysis also reports you are sending all-clear signals. Allow me to send the next signal for you.
Sent. Can I assist you further, Master Jedi?
Do you have any data on the Esh-kha?
About the Esh-kha....
I apologize, but there is no prisoner named "Esh-kha" in my database.
You've delayed me enough.
Thank you. Please check your belongings before leaving the psychiatric unit.
Excellent work, Jedi. The all-clear signals are sent, and Hallow Voice's chamber is unlocked.
Be careful. Our enemy has gone on the offensive.
Watch out for Geland.
You are noble to be worried, but I am safe.
What else remains to be done?
Can I reach him now?
You could have warned me I was walking into a trap.
I almost got committed!
The other is cunning. Many of my normal accesses have been blocked.
You will need to cross into the prison depths to find Hallow Voice. But be cautious. There are many hostile Esh-kha nearby.
If you survive the crossing, come to this location. It's time we met in person.
Good day.
Prolonged voice stress analysis confirms you are a Jedi, and I am required to help you. Transmitting data on local equipment stores.
Any information on Commander Geland would be very helpful.
Know anything about Geland?
I apologize, but since a system reset, I have no data on a "Commander Geland."
Logs report Commander Geland has been sending warden droids to search for a "master key."
I have no data on a "master key." It may refer to restricted areas beyond my clearance level.
The droid here said Commander Geland's looking for a master key. Do you know of it?
What's the "master key"?
I... cannot speak of this here. I will explain later.
Actually, I should go.
